title: Invitation, "DIFFA:  Love Ball", 1989
dimensions:
60.8 x 15.3 cm (24 1/4 x 6 in. [opened]
10.3 x 15.3 cm (4 x 6 in.) [closed]
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: The present information sheet, of a transparent material,  is one part of a two-part invitation to a charitable event, and would have been wrapped around the second part. The whole would then have been folded in sixths for mailing. The sheet is divided into three vertical strips, of which the center is imprinted entirely with a narrative about DIFFA, and the right and left consist of an all over pattern of irregular circular forms, outlined in black,  perhaps based on either cells or reptile skin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Invitation, "DIFFA:  Love Ball", 1989.
1989. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-121-a.
